main: ^Ah good evening, still here to work.
^Good evening, professor. Yes, I am in the middle of the conclusion of my thesis. In fact, if possible, I wanted to ask if I could stay a little longer if I don’t bother you.
^Oh, no problem. I have a day full of meetings, you can also stay into my office if you prefer. It is the next door.
^I just have one favor to ask, it won’t take much.
^Thank you! Of course, no problem. What is it about?
^As you can see I have here with me two small colleagues. They’re transferred squirrels for a research I’m working on.
^As I told you, I have a full schedule today and I can’t deal with them, but they're not in a very good condition and would need to be monitored.
^What you should do is follow the notes I wrote on that book.
^It's quite easy. Once finished you can leave them here to rest while you work in the next room.
^I’ll be back late to close the lab, until then you can stay.
^Let's see what I have to do.
